messages.title: Hard Brexit
messages.content: Labour have helped her to pursue Theresa May’s hard Brexit which Liberal Democrats opposed.

messages.title: A vote for the Liberal Democrats
messages.content: A vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote against Theresa May’s hard Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposition to Theresa May's hard Brexit, fighting to give citizens the final deal, rights of EU citizens and single market access.

mentions.candidate: I want to return as your MP – a job I loved and cherished for 32 years – I promise you will not feel ignored.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party are helping the Tories do it.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Everyone agrees that the Tories will win this UK general election. Labour have no hope. This election is our chance to send a message.

issues.brexitEurope: Opposed to Theresa May's hard Brexit. Want to give citizens the final say on the deal and protect rights of EU citizens and the economy.
issues.economy: Impact of hard Brexit on the economy.
issues.health: Impact of Brexit on the NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: As a passionate pro-European, I fought hard to remain.

politicalExperience.achievements: Gave voice to communities that were otherwise ignored.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Remember, a vote for me and the Liberal Democrats on June 8th is a vote against Theresa May’s hard Brexit which Labour have helped her to pursue.
